ai-patthana16.41:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana16.41:1.1_0: There are no cause or condition for the sake of listening to the teaching.
ai-patthana16.41:1.1_1: There’s no cause or condition for the arising of thought.
ai-patthana16.41:1.1_2: nor for the sake of cause, causes and reason why don’t arise with a reason for the teaching.
